snippet: The billionaire entrepreneur responds to questions about the third season of "Shark Tank," Occupy Wall Street and the Facebook I.P.O.
abstract: The billionaire entrepreneur responds to questions about the third season of "Shark Tank," Occupy Wall Street and the Facebook I.P.O.
lead_paragraph: Mark Cuban, the billionaire bon vivant, founder of HDNet and owner of the Dallas Mavericks, is not afraid to speak his mind. (See exhibits A, B, C, D, E, F, we could go on.)
